use_cases.name: Interactive Code Assistance
use_cases.description: User interacts with AI Chat to brainstorm and generate code snippets, which are then manually or semi-automatically integrated into the project.
workflow: User provides a prompt for code generation.
User reviews and copies code to workspace.

use_cases.name: Autonomous Agentic Workflow
use_cases.description: A set of agents (e.g., developer, reviewer) work together to complete a complex task without constant user intervention.
workflow: Task is decomposed into subtasks for specific agents.
Agents use LLM to process subtasks.
Feedback loop allows agents to refine outputs based on peer review.

use_cases.name: Specialized Neuron Processing
use_cases.description: Offloading specific technical tasks (like signal processing or complex pattern matching) to specialized Neuron AI models.
workflow: Agent identifies a task requiring specialized neural architecture (e.g., LSTM for time-series).
Request is routed to NeuronAI service (or internal NeuronEngine).
Results are integrated back into the main workflow.

use_cases.name: End-to-End CI/CD Automation
use_cases.description: Full loop from fetching code, generating features, building with Maven, and pushing back to Git.
workflow: Agents generate new code or fixes.
Maven component runs 'clean install' and tests.
Successful builds are committed and pushed via Git.

use_cases.name: Hybrid Local/Remote Inference
use_cases.description: Using Ollama for sensitive/local data processing while using high-capacity cloud LLMs for complex reasoning.
workflow: Simple or sensitive tasks are handled by local Ollama model.
Complex orchestration logic is processed by remote LLM.
Unified view in AI Output View aggregates both sources.
